name: Emu Invasion
description:
Emu Invasion is a Game Based on the Australian Great Emu War of 1932. You're fighting a losing battle, fighting against the great specimens that are the Australian Emus.

Like the Australians in the Emu War, the player has to switch between two miniguns to defend their wheat fields.

Controls:
WASD to move
I to enter and exit the gun.
Ctrl to Run

NOTE:
This game is NOT DONE. I will be updating it in the future, mostly focusing on adding an actual player model, adding transitions, and other miscellaneous stuff.
